docs.text: pydapters Data transformation library Simple example from pydapters import Adapter , Field , preprocess , postprocess class Address ( Adapter ): @preprocess def change_street ( self , data : dict , ** kwargs ): data [ 'street' ] = 'Second' return data @postprocess def chnage_number ( self , data : dict , ** kwargs ): data [ 'number' ] = 2 return data street = Field ( destination = 'st.' ) number = Field ( origin = 'nb.' ) assert Address () . adapt ({ 'street' : 'First' , 'nb.' : 1 }) == { 'st.' : 'Second' , 'number' : 2 , }
docs.title: Overview

docs.text: from pydapters import Adapter , Field , preprocess , postprocess class Address ( Adapter ): @preprocess def change_street ( self , data : dict , ** kwargs ): data [ 'street' ] = 'Second' return data @postprocess def chnage_number ( self , data : dict , ** kwargs ): data [ 'number' ] = 2 return data street = Field ( destination = 'st.' ) number = Field ( origin = 'nb.' ) assert Address () . adapt ({ 'street' : 'First' , 'nb.' : 1 }) == { 'st.' : 'Second' , 'number' : 2 , }
docs.title: Simple example
